Texts.Eng:
A race of arachnid-like aliens from a darkness covered planet, Arachne were discovered by the Protectorate and quickly integrated into spacefaring society. While creepy, they're generally friendly and are an extremely curious people.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Omnivore, But can eat Raw Meat.

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  Health x^green;1.25^reset;
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^green;40^reset;% Poison, +^green;20^reset;% Shadow
  +^green;15^reset;% Speed
  Immune: Insanity, Webs

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  ^green;Dark biomes^reset; (Does not include 'dark' variants of non-dark biomes.): Health and Energy x^green;1.15^reset;

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Spears: Damage x^green;1.25^reset;, +^green;15^reset;% Crit Damage
  Dual/Combo-Wielding (Bladed/Shortspear): Damage x^green;1.1^reset;, +^green;1^reset;% Crit Chance

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;20^reset;% Fire, Cosmic Resist
Texts.Chs:
作为一个来自黑暗星球的蛛形纲外星人种族，阿拉克涅被大地守护团发现，并迅速融入太空社会。虽然令人毛骨悚然，但他们通常很友好，是一个非常好奇的族群。

^orange;饮食^reset;：杂食动物，且可以吃生肉。

^orange;天赋^reset;：
生命值x ^green;1.25 ^reset;
 ^green;抗性^reset;：+^green;40 ^reset;%毒抗，+^green;20 ^reset;%暗影抗性
+^green;15 ^reset;%速度
免疫：疯癫、蛛网
 ^orange;环境^reset;：
 ^green;黑暗生物群落^reset;（不包括非黑暗生物群落的“黑暗”变体。）：生命和能量x ^green;1.15 ^reset;

^orange;武器^reset;：
矛：伤害x ^green;1.25 ^reset;+^green;15 ^reset;%暴击伤害
双手/组合武器(刀刃/短矛)：伤害x ^green;1.1 ^reset;+^green;1 ^reset;%暴击率

^red;弱点^reset;：
 ^red;抗性^reset;：-^red;20 ^reset;%火抗，宇宙射线抗性
